column3: m’enyiwa ehu iyi nyinara
ɔnoara na mo so minyim: Monntɔ mu wɔ hom enyim."

column2: "Ampa mepɛ dɛ nkyɛ menye Otumfo no bɛkasa
column3: Na morohwehwɛ dɛ menye Nyankopɔn beyiyi nsɛm ano."
hom yɛ atorfo mapa
column4: Hom nyinara hom yɛ ayarsafo a wɔnntow bo."

column3: kɛtseankyɛ hom mua hom ano koraa! Na nkyɛ mbom hom nyansaa nye no."
Na hom nyɛ aso mma me nyiano."

column2: "Ana hom bɛka no dza ɔnntsen mu ama Nyankopɔn
column3: Na hom akasa ndaadaa mu ama no a?"

column2: "Ana hom bɛgye ne tsir? Na hom aham ama Nyankopɔn anaa?"
"Ana oye dɛ nkyɛ ɔbɔhwehwɛ hom mu ehu? Anaa dɛ mbrɛ obi daadaa nyimpa no
column3: hom so bɛdaadaa no?"
Sɛ hom hwɛ nyimpa enyim nsumaa mu a."
Na no ho hu nnkɔtɔ hom do?"
Hom akoban yɛ awendɛtse akoban."
hom ngyaa me
column5: Na wɔmma dza ɔbɛba mo do mbra."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mebɛfa mo honam etua me se mu
column3: Na mafa mo nkwa ekitsa me nsamu?"
ɔnoara na mohwɛ: M’akwan ara nko na mebɛper ho wɔ n’enyim."
Dɛ nyia onnsuro Nyame no remmba n’enyim."
Na wɔmma m’asɛm a mepaa mu ka nkɔ hom asomu."
mahyehyɛ m’asɛm; Minyim dɛ midzi bem."

column2: "Woana nye nyia ɔnye me bedzi esi? Na afei mubomua m’ano
column3: na megyaa mo sunsum mu."
EWURADZE
column4: adze ebien pɛr na meserɛ wo dɛ mma mmfa nnyɛ me

column2: "Twe wo nsa fi mo do kɔ ekyirekyir: Na mma mma wo ho hu nnkitsa me."

column3: na mebɛgye wo do: Anaa ma menkasa

column2: "M’emumuyɛ na mo bɔn yɛ ahen ara? Ma munhu me mbrato na mo bɔn."

column3: Na ibu me wo tamfo yi?"

column2: "Ana ebɛtaa ahataw a mframa robɔ no kyin do? Na etsiw eburonan a eguan?"
"Na ɔwo ekyerɛw nsɛm wenwen dze tsia me
column3: Na ema midzi me mbofrabermu emumuyɛ ho adze:"

column2: "Ɔwo na edze m’anan so hyehyɛ apo mu
column3: na ehyɛ m’akwan nyinara nsew; Ɔwo na itwa m’ananadze ho he:"

column2: "Ntsi meresɛɛ dɛ adze prɔwee a ohi
column3: Dɛ atar a mbowaba awewe."
